subject: New Box---Several New Features and Modes ***
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_d59e8.279e9ac2.3be49675_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


4 Months in the making, i just received it in the mail today. We will  be 
showcasing it on the radio show tonight along with the builder Chris  Felton. 
 This radio offers Random modes that are very unique in the  way that they 
sweep the stations.  I have several ghost boxes that have  random modes, but 
this is the only box that has a working  random circuit.
 
Box also has shack hack mode, turbo hack mode, linear (sawtooth and  
triangle wave), random raw, random step and random step sweep.  It's  basically 
every box ever made all in one.
 
Chris also uses the box to help law enforcement.  Lots of info to  cover, 
please tune in and see how we put it all together.

_http://stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html_ 
(http://stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html) 
 
Show starts at 10pm est
 
Thanks,
-Steve H.
 




Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/) 
_http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/_ 
(http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/) 
_www.stevehultay.com_ (http://www.stevehultay.com/) 
_www.rtscresearch.org_ (http://www.rtscresearch.org/)
